str2: Thus, so, in this manner. Or (referring to what precedes or follows).
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.
A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).

parse: Reflexive Pronoun - Accusative Feminine 3rd Person Singular

str2: If. From ei and an; a conditional particle; in case that, provided, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
From a primary ergo; toil; by implication, an act.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
(a) adj: dead, lifeless, subject to death, mortal, (b) noun: a dead body, a corpse. From an apparently primary nekus; dead.
